title: OnePlus 8 Pro Review -  The Best Smartphone Right Now?
description: The OnePlus 8 and OnePlus 8 Pro are successors to the OnePlus 7T and OnePlus 7 Pro but are they really better smartphones?  When it comes to specs, camera performance, price and more, there's a lot to live up to.    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  OnePlus 8 - Coming Soon OnePlus 8 Pro - Coming Soon  Razer Deathadder Elite -   Razer Deathadder v2 -      Subscribe    Verge Link -   Review unit provided free of charge by OnePlus. This video is sponsored by Razer. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #oneplus8 #oneplus8pro #hardwarecanucks
